(That's what I've come up with since I started working on a long history of 
the NBW RPG as up-to-date as possible, though I'm not done, and I'm pretty 
sure I'm missing a lot of stuff, and some events may even be out of order.  
Feel free to remind me of important stuff I missed.  I was really just going 
by what I mostly remembered.  Thanks for any helpful comments.  But please, 
don't mention stuff AFTER the end of what I currently have.  Just the stuff 
before.)

Thanks again.

L. Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
